title: Cyber Monday Exclusive: Snag Top Web Hosting for $1.95/Month + Free Domain
description: Cyber Monday is here. Hosting a website has never been more affordable with Hostinger's exclusive offer. Find out more!
author: Gizmodo Deals
excerpt: Take advantage of this Hostinger Cyber Monday deal and claim it at 85% off. Hostinger has dropped to only $1.95/mo with a free domain.
text: This Cyber Monday, Hostinger decided to spice things up with a new exclusive deal. Newcomers can get 85% off for the Premium plan and pay a silly price of only $1.95/mo. What’s even better? You get a FREE domain for an entire YEAR! Hostinger has been churning out some of the most awesome deals this year. However, Cyber Monday marks the end of some of the largest hosting discounts. It’s time to react quickly, with no time for second thoughts, let alone third. See at Hostinger Hostinger Cyber Monday Savings: How to Get Them? Black Friday is over but don’t let depression embrace you. Instead, embrace the Hostinger Cyber Monday offer and save up to 85% on your new web hosting plan. We’re talking about the Premium plan, which now costs only $1.95/mo for 48 months with 3 free months on top. The Premium plan is great but wait till you hear about its upgrade. The Business plan at 80% off is for those a bit braver. A bit more demanding. Their taste buds for hosting will be satisfied with the price of $2.95/mo – quite a shocker. © Hostinger Hostinger’s plans come with a free domain for a year but that’s far from everything. WHOIS privacy protection is included and you won’t have to pay a dollar more. If you’re indecisive, perhaps a 30-day money-back guarantee will help. It allows you to try any Hostinger Cyber Monday offer, see if you like it, and get a reimbursement if things go south. How to snatch this awesome deal, you ask? Isn’t it obvious? Click any of the buttons to go to Hostinger’s site. Now select the plan, subscribe, and make your website; nothing simpler. What to Expect from this Web Host? The exclusive 85% off Cyber Monday Hostinger deal comes with ample features to enjoy. These discounts are for web hosting, which should suffice for mid-sized websites looking to cement their place and improve traffic and earnings. Regardless of the plan you choose, Hostinger comes with: Managed WordPress hosting SSD or NVMe storage Hostinger Website Builder Free domain with WHOIS privacy protection Automatic website migration (also free) DDoS protection Unlimited bandwidth 99.9% server uptime guarantee The Pro plan is an amazing option already but the Business plan pumps up the heart rate more. With 200 GB of NVMe storage, 100 websites, and advanced AI site-building tools, you’re off to a perfect start. But hey – you can’t go wrong with Hostinger either way. At the starting price of $1.95/mo, it costs virtually nothing, yet, it’s risk-free. Now go get yourself something nice this Cyber Monday. Don’t end up empty-handed. Get Hostinger for Cyber Monday and Save 85%
html:
This Cyber Monday, Hostinger decided to spice things up with a new exclusive deal. Newcomers can get 85% off for the Premium plan and pay a silly price of only $1.95/mo.

What’s even better? You get a FREE domain for an entire YEAR!

Hostinger has been churning out some of the most awesome deals this year. However, Cyber Monday marks the end of some of the largest hosting discounts.

It’s time to react quickly, with no time for second thoughts, let alone third.

See at Hostinger

Hostinger Cyber Monday Savings: How to Get Them?

Black Friday is over but don’t let depression embrace you. Instead, embrace the Hostinger Cyber Monday offer and save up to 85% on your new web hosting plan. We’re talking about the Premium plan, which now costs only $1.95/mo for 48 months with 3 free months on top.

The Premium plan is great but wait till you hear about its upgrade.

The Business plan at 80% off is for those a bit braver. A bit more demanding. Their taste buds for hosting will be satisfied with the price of $2.95/mo – quite a shocker.

Hostinger’s plans come with a free domain for a year but that’s far from everything. WHOIS privacy protection is included and you won’t have to pay a dollar more.

If you’re indecisive, perhaps a 30-day money-back guarantee will help. It allows you to try any Hostinger Cyber Monday offer, see if you like it, and get a reimbursement if things go south.

How to snatch this awesome deal, you ask? Isn’t it obvious? Click any of the buttons to go to Hostinger’s site. Now select the plan, subscribe, and make your website; nothing simpler.

What to Expect from this Web Host?

The exclusive 85% off Cyber Monday Hostinger deal comes with ample features to enjoy. These discounts are for web hosting, which should suffice for mid-sized websites looking to cement their place and improve traffic and earnings.

Regardless of the plan you choose, Hostinger comes with:

  • Managed WordPress hosting
  • SSD or NVMe storage
  • Hostinger Website Builder
  • Free domain with WHOIS privacy protection
  • Automatic website migration (also free)
  • DDoS protection
  • Unlimited bandwidth
  • 99.9% server uptime guarantee

The Pro plan is an amazing option already but the Business plan pumps up the heart rate more. With 200 GB of NVMe storage, 100 websites, and advanced AI site-building tools, you’re off to a perfect start.

But hey – you can’t go wrong with Hostinger either way.

At the starting price of $1.95/mo, it costs virtually nothing, yet, it’s risk-free. Now go get yourself something nice this Cyber Monday. Don’t end up empty-handed.

Get Hostinger for Cyber Monday and Save 85%
